name: Sx Purse
desc: Use this item to gain some Sx. Does not end unit's turn.

name: Loot Bag
desc: Use this item to gain a random <green>stat booster</>. Does not end unit's turn.

name: Fap
desc: Let's have fun! Applies a buff. Gains 5 mana.

name: Rock
desc:
Long range improvised weapon used by orcs. Has an area of effect damage. Units hit by this are <red>[STUNNED]</>.
Has 1 turn cooldown.
<red>[STUNNED]</>: Cannot act for 1 turn.

name: Cyanoglussy
desc: Plants a bomb seed, which explodes next turn. 1 turn cooldown.

name: Dance
desc: <green>Refreshes</> an allied unit, letting them act again this turn. Costs <blue> 4 mana</>.

name: Lusting Gaze
desc: Riala inflicts a unit with <red>[DESIRED]</>. This unit will be the victim of Riala's attack next turn.

name: Lethal Lust
desc:
Riala targets her enemy with a rain of painful lust. Unit loses half of their health. Unit is inflicted with <red>[LEAKING]</>.
<red>[LEAKING]</>: Unit heals nearby enemies.

name: Healing Kiss
desc: User heals and restores allied targets of debuffs.

name: Dark Web
desc:
A siege weapon which shoots at a straight line. Units hit by this will get WEBBED.
<red>WEBBED</>: -5 SPD, -3 MOV. Duration: 1 turn.

name: Heroic Blow
desc:
Deals more damage to monsters.
<blue>Costs 10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Assault
desc:
Deals damage to enemies around the user.
<blue>10 mana</>

name: Heroic Aura
desc:
Calls upon the light of Ivala to heal the user completely.
<blue>10 mana.</>

name: Shining Sword
desc: The Chosen's ultimate weapon. Uses MAG to determine damage. Has a 1 turn cooldown.

name: Strategic Strikes
desc: List of strikes aiming to hinder the opponent.

name: Heroic Imitation
desc:
Simon attempts to copy the Chosen. Deals more damage to monsters.
<blue>Costs 10 mana</>.

name: Flashy Strike
desc:
Powerful attack with lots of choreography. Antarion will stand behind the target after combat.
Costs <blue>10 mana.</>

name: Drink Potion
desc: Antarion drinks a health potion. Has 2 uses per chapter.

name: Rapier
desc: Antarion only weapon. When equipped, deals +5 damage on critical hits.

name: Soothing Presence
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar with double the potency. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Penitence
desc:
Monica suffers for the sake of others. Heals in an area. Allies gain <red>[BLESSED]</>. Costs <red>HP equal to half of MAX HP</> and <blue>10 mana</>.
<red>[BLESSED]</>: Unit takes half damage in the next combat.

name: Firewall
desc:
Rosa ignites fire at an empty tile. Units standing on it get <red>[BURNED]</>. Lasts 3 turns. Cooldown: 3 turns. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start of unit's turn.

name: Firewall
desc:
Rosa ignites fire at an empty tile. Units standing on it get <red>[BURNED]</>. Lasts 3 turns. Costs <blue>6 mana</>.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start of unit's turn.
components: target is None or target == unit

name: Flashy Escape
desc:
Safado moves backwards from the target while inflicting <red>[BLINDED]</>. Can attack after.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Nothing Personal
desc:
Safado jumps to the other side of the target, inflicting <red>[POISONED]</>. Safado's next attack on this turn also inflicts <red>[POISONED]</>. Can attack after. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.
<red>[POISONED]</>: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

name: Stalling Stance
desc:
Safado can grant himself the Stalling Stance status. When active, neither Safado nor their enemies will land their attacks. Enemis are more likely to attack him. Safado inflicts <red>[FRUSTRATED]</> on enemies after combat. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[FRUSTRATED]</>: DEF and RES reduced. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Debuff is lost on receiving an attack.

name: Chameleon stance
desc:
Safado applies <green>[CHAMELEON STANCE]</>. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<green>[CHAMELEON STANCE]</>: Safado can pass through enemy units. He has bonus MOV and AVOID. Less likely to be attacked by enemy units. This buff is lost when Safado attacks someone.

name: Social Distancing
desc:
Safado shoves any unit 1 tile away. Can attack after.
Costs <blue>2 mana</>.

name: Make way
desc:
Deals damage and pushes target 1 tile away.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Pistil Pleasure
desc: Minerve hits an enemy with a powerful Lust attack. 1 turn cooldown.

name: Area Of Ero
desc: Minerve hits an area with a Lust attack. 1 turn cooldown.

name: Constricting Love
desc:
Milena entangles an enemy, inflicting it with <red>[SQUEEZED]</>. Costs <blue>15 mana</>.
<red>[SQUEEZED]</>: Unit cannot move and has decreased attack and defense speed.

name: Rally Resistance
desc: Increases RES of allies within 2 tiles for the remainder of this turn. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Poisoned Blade
desc:
Aka poisons her blade, inflicting <red>[POISON]</> on her attack.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Cautious Swipes
desc: Releases weak but rapid strikes from behind cover.

name: Martial Masturbation
desc: Gain 2 mana. Buffs STR, DEF and SPD. [Cooldown: 2]

name: Desperate Masturbation
desc: Costs 5 HP. Gain 2 mana. Buffs STR and MAG. [Cooldown: 2]

name: Healing Masturbation
desc: Heals HP and status effects. Gain 2 mana. [Cooldown: 2]

name: Command
desc:
Swaps an active ally for an undeployed one. The movement availability is carried over.
<red>Can only be used once per chapter.</>

name: Switch Stance
desc: Display Auras that Uyae can channel into.

name: Aura of Might
desc:
Aura of Might shifts power from magical to physical.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>. Lasts for 3 turns. Cooldown: 2 turns.

name: Aura of Spirit
desc:
Aura of Might shifts power from physical to magical.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>. Lasts for 3 turns. Cooldown: 2 turns.

name: Offensive Rain
desc:
Targets a group of enemies, hindering their defensive stats.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Defensive Rain
desc:
Targets a group of enemies, hindering their offensive stats.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Blinding Rain
desc:
Targets a group of enemies, possibly blinding them.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Anti-Tyrant Essence
desc: Riala supresses an enemy with pure damage. <blue> 10 Mana </>.

name: Rapier
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units

name: Runesword
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Drains HP from enemy

name: Wind Sword
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Effective against fliers.

name: Reginleif
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Siegmund
desc: Ephraim only. Strength +5. Effective against monsters.

name: Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Trade
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: target.wexp['Light'] or target.wexp['Anima'] or target.wexp['Dark'] or target.wexp['Staff']

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Latona
desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

name: Succubus Kiss
desc: User recovers HP equal to damage dealt.

name: Nightmare
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Serum
desc: Removes negative statuses from adjacent ally or yourself.

name: Mana Potion
desc: Restores 5 Mana. <red>Can't be used by Succubi</>.

name: Large Mana Potion
desc: Restores 10 Mana. <red>Can't be used by Succubi</>.

name: Huge Mana Potion
desc: Restores 20 Mana. <red>Can't be used by Succubi</>.

name: Sylvan Draught
desc: Restores 99 HP and 20 Mana for the entire party.

name: Beer
desc: Cheap alcohol. Heals for 20 HP, but user is inflicted with <red>[CONFUSION]</>.

name: Mana Wine
desc: Magical alcohol. Restores <blue>10 mana</>, but user is inflicted with <red>[CONFUSION]</>.

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 2 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Master Seal
desc:
Promotes a unit into a next tier class. Some classes can't be promoted.
Unit must be at level 10 or more.

name: Fili Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Hoplon Guard
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.

name: <yellow>Sexy Librarian Glasses</>
desc: Boosts MAG, RES and SPD. <red>Succubus only</>.

name: Refresh
desc:
Allied target can move again.
Can't target other <red>Succubi</> or <red>Unpeople</>.
